<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// If U is widenable branch looking like:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   %cond = ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   %wc = call i1 @llvm.experimental.widenable.condition()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   %branch&#95;cond = and i1 %cond, %wc</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   br i1 %branch&#95;cond, label %if&#95;true&#95;bb, label %if&#95;false&#95;bb ; &lt;--- U</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The function returns true, and the values %cond and %wc and blocks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// %if&#95;true&#95;bb, if&#95;false&#95;bb are returned in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the parameters (Condition, WidenableCondition, IfTrueBB and IfFalseFF)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// respectively. If \\p U does not match this pattern, return false.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a745200db7bc2a7a3c17fa379fb1b56c3">parseWidenableBranch</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a> &#42;U, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;&amp;Condition,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;&amp;WidenableCondition, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;&amp;IfTrueBB,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;&amp;IfFalseBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Analogous to the above, but return the Uses so that they can be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// modified. Unlike previous version, Condition is optional and may be null.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;&amp;IfFalseBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The guard condition is expected to be in form of:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   cond1 &amp;&amp; cond2 &amp;&amp; cond3 ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// or in case of widenable branch:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   cond1 &amp;&amp; cond2 &amp;&amp; cond3 &amp;&amp; widenable&#95;contidion ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Method collects the list of checks, but skips widenable&#95;condition.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"></CodeLine>
